nda.title: Enable prequalification/NDA signing step
nda.sub_title: Participants gain access to the request description after your confirmation

description_and_files.title: Description and files
description_and_files.placeholder: Specify the subject of your request...
description_and_files.add_files: Add terms of reference, specifications, draft contract, etc.
description_and_files.warning_text:
The documents are available to the supplying companies.
 Login or register a company on the site.

contact_info.title: The contact person
contact_info.add_contact: Indicate a person for communication with suppliers

delivery_address.title: Delivery address
delivery_address.add: Place of delivery of goods or services

tags.title: Tags
tags.add: Describe the subject of your request with keywords

positions.title: Goods and services
positions.empty: Provide the specification of purchased items for easy bid comparison

questionnaire.title: Questionnaire
questionnaire.empty: Customize the participant questionnaire, set non-price request conditions and criteria for comparison of offers
questionnaire.warning_text:
The information is available to supplier companies.
Login or register a company on the site.

gold.title: Bidzaar magic

text.message: Make the request simple, fast and efficient.
text.warning: It is impossible to disable magic after publishing the request

gold.on: Magic is enabled. The circle of participants is limited (the type of request is closed)
gold.off: Magic is disabled. The circle of participants is unlimited (the type of request is open)

registries.title: Accreditation of participants

text.1: Only suppliers accredited in the following registries can submit a bid
text.2: Accredited suppliers are automatically invited to the request when the request is published
text.3: Non-accredited participants may simultaneously pass accreditation and prepare a proposal

registries.empty: Registries are not specified. Accreditation is not required to submit proposals

empty.text: Your company does not have published registries.

actions.change_acceptance_end_date: Change the deadline for accepting proposals

blocked.title: Request details not available
blocked.sub_title:
The customer excluded you from the request. The request is limited to the number of participants.
Have questions? Contact the customer.

message_payment.text: Participation in the request is free, without deposits and funds blocking!
message_payment.link: What do I have to pay for?
